name: Air Supply: 1Bit Run
description:
This is a port of my original iPhone game from 2011 - presented on Mac for the first time, warts 'n' all! Hope you enjoy it! :)

Mac Keyboard controls:

SPACE - Jump/Double Jump

SHIFT - Shoot!

Your AIR is running out! 

Ambushed on a standard trade jump between Lave and Diso, Spaceman Sam is shot down by space pirates!

Oh no!

Now, stranded on an alien Moon, Sam must run for his life, avoiding meteorites, fearsome UFOs and enemies such as robots, aliens, and Space Monkey Zombie Pirate Cyborgs(!), hoping in vain to stay alive long enough to be rescued!

Original iPhone game Reviews:

Pocketgamer.co.uk says: “It’s fast, familiar, and fun, giving you everything you want in an endless runner… Air Supply has enough charm and good content to make stand with the best endless running games”

arcadelife.co.uk says: “Air Supply gets it SO right it’s frightening! […] It’s your new favourite running game – you just don’t know it yet.”

Killscreen says: “This is a just game. You can jam on it.”

How awesome is that? Thank you! 😀

Features:

*Pure awesome gameplay: Run, jump, shoot, collect!

*Air Supply game mechanic – your air is constantly going down – pickup 02 canisters to increase it and keep yourself alive!

*Gorgeous monochrome 1bit graphics! 

*Cosmic 1bit music by Mr. Beep, made using a ZX Spectrum! Eight amazing tracks to unlock!

 *Grab powerups! Slow down your speed, grab a full tank of air, or protect yourself with shields! 

*Gain ranks based on kills – from ‘Harmless’ to the coveted title of ‘Elite’. 

*Unlock everything! Play the game to unlock new characters, backgrounds, enemies, music and even colours!

*Two modes of play – classic running action in ‘Air Supply’ mode, or fly a rocket in ‘Fuel Supply’ mode!

*Special Guest appearances! 

*18 Achievements to attain! 

**How long will you last before your Air Supply runs out???**
